casebody.data:
No. 497, No. 876, No. 1000,

Misc.

Misc.

Misc.

McDaniel v. Campbell, Comptroller General of the United States, et al.; Baxter v. Johnson, Clerk, U. S. District Court, et al.; and Chauffeurs, Teamsters and Helpers “General” Local No. 200 v. United States Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit et al. David Previant for petitioner in No. 1000, Mise. Solicitor General Rankin, Stuart Rothman, Dominick L. Manoli, Norton J. Come and Duane B. Beeson filed a memorandum for the National Labor Relations Board in No. 1000, Mise.

Motions for leave to file petitions for writs of mandamus denied.
